it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.gionnino9000.heuristics

Class WhiteHeuristics

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.gionnino9000.heuristics.Heuristics
      • it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.gionnino9000.heuristics.WhiteHeuristics

  • public class WhiteHeuristics
extends Heuristics
    Heuristics for the evaluation of a white player state.
    Description: the defender (white player) heuristics is based on a weighted sum, with 4 different weights (WHITE_ALIVE, BLACK_EATEN, KING_MOVEMENT, SAFE_PAWNS) and bonuses in special cases.
    The key feature is the pre-evaluation of the king check states: if the king can be captured in a specific state, we immediately return the worst value (-Infinite) for that state, without making further calculations.
